japanese:
うーん、わかんないわね。
一体何がダメなのかしら？
translation:
Hmm, I don't get it.
What exactly is wrong with my observation?

japanese: 昨日、四葉と五月を観察してみたけど――
translation: Yesterday, I observed Yotsuba and Itsuki, but%p-2;――

japanese:
特に、これといった妹らしい雰囲気っていうか、
それっぽいところが見えないのよね。
translation: I can't figure out a little sister vibe from any of them.

japanese:
四葉は元気で、妙なところに気を遣いすぎる
いつもの四葉だし……。
translation:
Yotsuba is her usual self, she cares too much
about the strangest of things...

japanese:
五月は、真面目でお堅くてしっかり者だけど、
変に抜けてるところがある感じ……。
translation:
Itsuki is serious, stubborn and organized,
but there's something off about her behaviour...

japanese:
四葉は四葉っていう１人の人間で、
五月も五月という１人の人間……。
translation:
Yotsuba is as always,
and Itsuki is as always...

japanese:
妹だからこうなる、っていう雰囲気は
あまり感じられないのよね。
translation: I don't feel any sort of little sister vibe.

japanese: よし、決めたわ。
translation: Alright, I've made up my mind.

japanese:
やっぱりここは、真なる妹――
らいはちゃんに弟子入りするしかないわね！
translation:
Well, there's only one choice! I need to become the 
apprentice of the TRUE little sister%p-2;――
%p;Raiha-chan!

japanese:
あっ、二乃さん！
おはようございまーす。
translation:
Ah, Nino-san!
Good mooorning!

japanese: ええ、おはよう。
translation: Yes, good morning.

japanese:
もしかして、もうお腹空いちゃった？
あとちょっとで朝ご飯できるから待っててね。
translation:
Perhaps you're hungry already?
Breakfast will be ready in a little while, 
please wait for me Nino.

japanese:
あ、何か飲み物いる？
紅茶と緑茶ならすぐ出せるから、
遠慮なく言ってね。
translation:
Ah, would you like something to drink?
I can get you some black or green tea,
so don't hesitate to ask.

japanese:
（これ、これよ！　これだわ！
　さりげなく相手のことを気遣えるこの感じ！）
translation: (This is it! Caring for other people in a natural way!)

japanese:
（年齢差なんて関係なく、誰にでも
　ナチュラルな態度を取れるような自然体。
　それがフー君の好みのタイプなのね！）
translation:
(Someone that can naturally get along with anyone,
 regardless of the age difference.
 That's the type of person Fu-kun likes!)

japanese: 二乃さん？　どうしたの？
translation: Nino-san? What's the matter?

japanese:
らいはちゃん！
お願い、私の師匠になって！
translation:
Raiha-chan!
Please, become my master!

japanese:
……ええ？
私が師匠って、なんの？
translation:
...Huh?
What do you mean, become your master?

japanese:
実はね、その……
私、少し前からフー君の好みのタイプを研究してるの。
translation:
Actually, well...
I've been doing some research
into what type of girl Fu-kun likes.

japanese:
でも、どうしても、これだっていう
理想にたどり着けなくて。
translation:
But no matter what,
I couldn't capture what he likes in a girl.

japanese:
それで……フー君が心を許しているらいはちゃんに
弟子入りさせてもらいたいんだけど……どうかしら？
translation:
So... Raiha-chan, I want you to become my master
and teach me how to naturally take care of others...
What do you think?

japanese:
二乃さん……！
お兄ちゃんのこと、
そこまで考えてくれてるなんて……！
translation:
Nino-san!
You're thinking too much about big bro!

japanese:
もちろん、私は真剣よ。
なんとかして、フー君に
振り向いてもらいたいって思ってる。
translation:
I'm very serious, ya know.
I want to get Fu-kun to notice me.

japanese:
だけど……こんなこと言うのは
情けないけど、わからないのよ。
どうしたらフー君に……。
translation:
It's a little pathetic to tell you this...
but I have no idea on how I can approach Fu-kun...

japanese:
任せて、二乃さん！
私、応援する！
translation:
Leave it to me, Nino-san!
I'll support you!

japanese:
お兄ちゃんのことが知りたいなら、
なんでも教えちゃうから！
translation:
I'll tell you anything you need to know
about my big brother!

japanese:
あ、ううん、違うの。
フー君のことを教えてほしいわけじゃなくて……。
translation:
Uhm, no, I meant something different.
You don't have to tell me aything about Fu-kun...

japanese:
私が、フー君の理想に近づくために
力を貸してほしいの。
translation:
Could you instead tell me how to become Fu-kun's 
ideal girl?

japanese:
フー君のすぐそばで、当たり前のように
フー君を支えることのできる
らいはちゃんみたいになれるように。
translation:
For you Raiha-chan it's the most natural thing to
support Fu-kun and I want you to show me how
you do it. I wanna become just like you.

japanese: 私みたいに？
translation: Like me?

japanese:
もちろん、らいはちゃんの立場を
奪い取ろうってわけじゃないわ。
らいはちゃんを通して、フー君の理想を見極めたいの。
translation:
Of course, I'm not trying to usurp your position.
Through you, Raiha-chan, I want to find out about
how I can become Fu-kun's perfect girlfriend.

japanese:
だから、お願い！
私の師匠として、フー君と
どんな風に付き合うのがいいか見せて！
translation:
So, I'm begging you!
As my master, please show me the best way
to get closer to Fu-kun!

japanese:
ええっと、よくわかんないけど……
お兄ちゃんとどんな風におしゃべりしたらいいか、
とか、そういうこと？
translation:
Umm, I don't really get it, but...
you wanna know how you could start a 
conversation with my brother, and stuff like that?

japanese:
ええ、そう！
らいはちゃんはいつも通りにしてるだけでいいわ。
translation:
Yes! That!
Please behave as you normally do, Raiha-chan.

japanese:
うん、わかった！
任せて！
translation:
Okay, I got it!
Leave it to me!

japanese: ありがとう！
translation: Thank you so much!

japanese:
いえいえ！
あのお兄ちゃんにモテ期が来るなんて
一生ないと思ってたから……。
translation:
Not at all.
I never expected that big bro would be
attractive for any women...

japanese:
二乃さん、こちらこそ、
お兄ちゃんをよろしくお願いしますっ！
translation: Nino-san, I beg of you to take very good care of him!
